title: Recreational vehicles
fullText:
Recreational vehicles (see Clause 1.4.18) including, but not limited to:
(a) Caravans.
(b) Camper vans.
(c) Motor homes.
(d) Camper trailers.
(e) Pop top caravans.
(f) Tent trailers.
(g) Fifth wheel caravans.
(h) Slide on campers.
(i) Converted buses or trailers. See Figure 1.1 for further information.
